eo-input.doc: 表单输入框构件。 ```yaml preview - brick: eo-input # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # ``` ## Examples ### Label ```yaml preview - brick: eo-input properties: label: 输入框 # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # ``` ### Value ```yaml preview - brick: eo-input properties: value: Default Value # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # ``` ### Disabled ```yaml preview - brick: eo-input properties: value: Default Value disabled: true # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # ``` ### Clearable ```yaml preview - brick: eo-input properties: value: Default Value clearable: true # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # ``` ### Placeholder ```yaml preview - brick: eo-input properties: placeholder: This is placeholder... # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # ``` ### max length ```yaml preview - brick: eo-input properties: placeholder: max length = 5 maxLength: 5 # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # ``` ### Type ```yaml preview - brick: eo-input properties: label: password type: password - brick: eo-input properties: label: date type: date - brick: eo-input properties: label: color type: color - brick: eo-input properties: label: search type: search # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # # ``` ### Size ```yaml preview - brick: eo-input properties: size: large placeholder: large - brick: eo-input properties: size: medium placeholder: medium - brick: eo-input properties: size: small placeholder: small # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ### Input Style ```yaml preview - brick: eo-input properties: placeholder: "width: 180px" inputStyle: width: 180px - brick: eo-input properties: placeholder: "width: 250px" inputStyle: width: 250px - brick: eo-input properties: placeholder: "border style" inputStyle: border: "1px solid #8b2121" # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # # # ``` ### Event ```yaml preview - brick: eo-input events: label: Event change: action: message.success args: - <% EVENT.detail %> focus: action: message.success args: - focus blur: action: message.success args: - blur # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ### Slot ```yaml preview gap - brick: eo-input properties: placeholder: prefix slot slots: prefix: bricks: - brick: eo-icon properties: icon: search lib: antd theme: outlined - brick: eo-input properties: placeholder: suffix slot slots: suffix: bricks: - brick: eo-icon properties: icon: search lib: antd theme: outlined - brick: eo-input properties: placeholder: addon slot slots: addonBefore: type: bricks bricks: - brick: span properties: textContent: https:// addonAfter: type: bricks bricks: - brick: span properties: textContent: .com # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # # # # # https:// # .com # # ```

eo-textarea.doc:
表单多行文本输入框构件。

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-textarea
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-textarea></eo-textarea>
# 
```

## Examples

### Label

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-textarea
  properties:
    label: 多行输入框
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-textarea label="多行输入框"></eo-textarea>
# 
```

### Value

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-textarea
  properties:
    value: Default Value
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-textarea value="Default Value"></eo-textarea>
# 
```

### Disabled

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-textarea
  properties:
    value: Default Value
    disabled: true
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-textarea value="Default Value" disabled></eo-textarea>
# 
```

### Placeholder

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-textarea
  properties:
    placeholder: This is placeholder...
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-textarea placeholder="This is placeholder..."></eo-textarea>
# 
```

### max length

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-textarea
  properties:
    placeholder: max length = 10
    maxLength: 10
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-textarea placeholder="max length = 10" max-length="10"></eo-textarea>
# 
```

### AutoSize

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-textarea
  properties:
    placeholder: "autoSize: true"
    autoSize: true
- brick: eo-textarea
  properties:
    placeholder: "autoSize: { minRows: 3}"
    autoSize:
      minRows: 3
- brick: eo-textarea
  properties:
    placeholder: "autoSize: { minRows: 3, maxRows: 5}"
    autoSize:
      minRows: 3
      maxRows: 5
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-textarea placeholder="autoSize: true" id="brick-1"></eo-textarea>
# <eo-textarea placeholder="autoSize: { minRows: 3}" id="brick-2"></eo-textarea>
# <eo-textarea
#   placeholder="autoSize: { minRows: 3, maxRows: 5}"
#   id="brick-3"
# ></eo-textarea>
# 
# <script>
#   const brick_1 = document.getElementById("brick-1");
#   brick_1.autoSize = true;
# 
#   const brick_2 = document.getElementById("brick-2");
#   brick_2.autoSize = {
#     minRows: 3,
#   };
# 
#   const brick_3 = document.getElementById("brick-3");
#   brick_3.autoSize = {
#     minRows: 3,
#     maxRows: 5,
#   };
# </script>
# 
```

### Textarea Style

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-textarea
  properties:
    placeholder: "width: 180px"
    textareaStyle:
      width: 180px
- brick: eo-textarea
  properties:
    placeholder: "width: 250px"
    textareaStyle:
      width: 250px
- brick: eo-textarea
  properties:
    placeholder: "border style"
    textareaStyle:
      border: "1px solid #8b2121"
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-textarea placeholder="width: 180px" id="brick-1"></eo-textarea>
# <eo-textarea placeholder="width: 250px" id="brick-2"></eo-textarea>
# <eo-textarea placeholder="border style" id="brick-3"></eo-textarea>
# 
# <script>
#   const brick_1 = document.getElementById("brick-1");
#   brick_1.textareaStyle = {
#     width: "180px",
#   };
# 
#   const brick_2 = document.getElementById("brick-2");
#   brick_2.textareaStyle = {
#     width: "250px",
#   };
# 
#   const brick_3 = document.getElementById("brick-3");
#   brick_3.textareaStyle = {
#     border: "1px solid #8b2121",
#   };
# </script>
# 
```

### Event

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-textarea
  events:
    label: Event
    change:
      action: message.success
      args:
        - <% EVENT.detail %>
    focus:
      action: message.success
      args:
        - focus
    blur:
      action: message.success
      args:
        - blur
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-textarea id="brick-1"></eo-textarea>
# 
# <script>
#   const brick_1 = document.getElementById("brick-1");
#   brick_1.addEventListener("label", (e) => {
#     // WARN: encountered incompatible event handlers in HTML mode, please try YAML.
#   });
#   brick_1.addEventListener("change", (e) => {
#     const message = document.createElement("basic.show-notification");
#     message.resolve({ type: "success", message: e.detail });
#   });
#   brick_1.addEventListener("focus", (e) => {
#     const message = document.createElement("basic.show-notification");
#     message.resolve({ type: "success", message: "focus" });
#   });
#   brick_1.addEventListener("blur", (e) => {
#     const message = document.createElement("basic.show-notification");
#     message.resolve({ type: "success", message: "blur" });
#   });
# </script>
# 
```

eo-form.doc:
表单构件。 ## Examples ### Layout ```yaml preview - brick: eo-form properties: layout: inline slots: "": bricks: - brick: eo-input properties: label: input - brick: eo-select properties: label: select - brick: div properties: style: height: 1px background: "#abc" margin: "20px 0" - brick: eo-form properties: layout: horizontal slots: "": bricks: - brick: eo-input properties: label: input - brick: eo-select properties: label: select - brick: div properties: style: height: 1px background: "#abc" margin: "20px 0" - brick: eo-form properties: layout: vertical slots: "": bricks: - brick: eo-input properties: label: input - brick: eo-select properties: label: select # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # #
# # # # #
# # # # # ``` ### Values ```yaml preview - brick: eo-form properties: values: input: This is default value select: Beijing radio: Guangzhou checkbox: - C - D textarea: "Hello World! \nNice to see you!" dynamicForm: - input: beijing select: Guangzhou - input: shenzhen select: Shenzhen slots: "": bricks: - brick: eo-input properties: label: input name: input - brick: eo-select properties: label: select name: select options: - Beijing - Shanghai - brick: eo-radio properties: label: radio name: radio options: - Guangzhou - Shenzhen - brick: eo-checkbox properties: name: checkbox label: checkbox options: - A - B - C - D - brick: eo-textarea properties: name: textarea label: textarea autoSize: minRows: 3 - brick: eo-dynamic-form-item properties: label: dynamic-form name: dynamicForm useBrick: - brick: eo-input properties: name: input - brick: eo-select properties: name: select options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # # # # # # # # ``` ### Events ```yaml preview - brick: eo-form events: values.change: - action: console.log validate.success: - action: message.success args: - 表单提交成功 validate.error: - action: message.error args: - 表单校验失败 slots: "": bricks: - brick: eo-input properties: required: true name: name label: 姓名 max: 6 min: 2 message: required: 一定要填写姓名哟 max: 不能超过 6 个字符哟 min: 最少填写 2 个字符哟 - brick: eo-select properties: required: true name: sex label: 性别 options: - label: 男 value: 0 - label: 女 value: 1 - brick: eo-submit-buttons # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # # # # # ``` ### Method ```yaml preview - brick: eo-form properties: id: form slots: "": bricks: - brick: eo-input properties: required: true name: name label: 姓名 max: 6 min: 2 - brick: eo-select properties: required: true name: sex label: 性别 options: - label: 男 value: 0 - label: 女 value: 1 - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: validateFields events: click: - target: "#form" method: validate - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: setInitValue events: click: - target: "#form" method: setInitValue args: - name: Mike sex: 0 - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: resetFields events: click: - target: "#form" method: resetFields - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: resetFields(name) events: click: - target: "#form" method: resetFields args: - name - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: getFieldsValue events: click: - target: "#form" method: getFieldsValue callback: success: - action: console.log - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: getFieldsValue(name) events: click: - target: "#form" method: getFieldsValue args: - name callback: success: - action: console.log - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: validateField(name) events: click: - target: "#form" method: validateField args: - name - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: resetValidateState events: click: - target: "#form" method: resetValidateState # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # # validateFields # setInitValue # resetFields # resetFields(name) # getFieldsValue # getFieldsValue(name) # validateField(name) # resetValidateState # # # ```

eo-radio.doc:
表单单选构件。 ```yaml preview - brick: eo-radio properties: options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ## Examples ### Label ```yaml preview - brick: eo-radio properties: label: city options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ### Value ```yaml preview - brick: eo-radio properties: options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen value: Guangzhou # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ### Options ```yaml preview - brick: eo-radio properties: options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen value: Guangzhou - brick: eo-radio properties: options: - label: Beijing value: 0 - label: Shanghai value: 1 icon: icon: "bar-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 - label: Shenzhen value: 3 value: 2 - brick: eo-radio properties: options: - true - false # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # # # ``` ### Disabled ```yaml preview - brick: eo-radio properties: options: - label: Beijing value: 0 disabled: true - label: Shanghai value: 1 - label: Guangzhou value: 2 - label: Shenzhen value: 3 - brick: div properties: style: height: 20px - brick: eo-radio properties: disabled: true options: - label: Beijing value: 0 - label: Shanghai value: 1 - label: Guangzhou value: 2 - label: Shenzhen value: 3 # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # #
# # # # ``` ### Size(Only use when type was button) ```yaml preview - brick: eo-radio properties: label: large size: large type: button options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen - brick: div properties: style: height: 20px - brick: eo-radio properties: label: medium size: medium type: button options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen - brick: div properties: style: height: 20px - brick: eo-radio properties: label: small size: small type: button options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # #
# #
# # # # ``` ### Type ```yaml preview - brick: eo-radio properties: label: Default type: default value: Beijing options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen - brick: eo-radio properties: label: Button type: button value: Shanghai options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen - brick: eo-radio properties: label: Icon type: icon value: 1 options: - label: Beijing value: 0 icon: icon: "area-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Shanghai value: 1 icon: icon: "bar-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 icon: icon: "area-chart" lib: "antd" - brick: eo-radio properties: label: Icon Cricle type: icon-circle value: 0 options: - label: Beijing value: 0 icon: icon: "area-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Shanghai value: 1 icon: icon: "bar-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 icon: icon: "area-chart" lib: "antd" - brick: eo-radio properties: label: Icon Square type: icon-square value: 2 options: - label: Beijing value: 0 icon: icon: "area-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Shanghai value: 1 icon: icon: "bar-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 icon: icon: "area-chart" lib: "antd" # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # # # # # ``` ### Event ```yaml preview - brick: eo-radio properties: id: option-radio options: - label: Beijing value: 0 - label: Shanghai value: 1 icon: icon: "bar-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 - label: Shenzhen value: 3 events: change: - action: message.success args: - <% JSON.stringify(EVENT.detail) %> options.change: - action: message.success args: - <% JSON.stringify(EVENT.detail) %> - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: Click to Change Radio Option events: click: - target: "#option-radio" properties: options: - label: Beijing value: 0 - label: Shanghai value: 1 icon: icon: "bar-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 - label: Shenzhen value: 3 - label: Hangzhou value: 4 # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # Click to Change Radio Option # # # ```

eo-select.doc: 表单下拉选择构件。 ```yaml preview - brick: eo-select properties: options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ## Examples ### Label ```yaml preview - brick: eo-select properties: label: city options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ### Value ```yaml preview - brick: eo-select properties: label: city value: Shanghai options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ### Options ```yaml preview - brick: eo-select properties: label: string options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen value: Guangzhou - brick: div properties: style: height: 20px - brick: eo-select properties: label: Array

eo-submit-buttons.doc:
表单提交按钮。
(tips: 通常在于 eo-form 构件搭配使用)

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-submit-buttons
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-submit-buttons></eo-submit-buttons>
# 
```

## Examples

### Submit Button Text & Cancel Button Text

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-submit-buttons
  properties:
    submitText: submit
    cancelText: cancel
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-submit-buttons
#   submit-text="submit"
#   cancel-text="cancel"
# ></eo-submit-buttons>
# 
```

### Disabled After Click & Submit Button Disabled

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-submit-buttons
  properties:
    submitText: submit
    cancelText: cancel
    submitDisabled: true
- brick: eo-submit-buttons
  properties:
    submitText: click to disabled
    cancelText: cancel
    disableAfterClick: true
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-submit-buttons
#   submit-text="submit"
#   cancel-text="cancel"
#   submit-disabled
# ></eo-submit-buttons>
# <eo-submit-buttons
#   submit-text="click to disabled"
#   cancel-text="cancel"
#   disable-after-click
# ></eo-submit-buttons>
# 
```

### Type

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-submit-buttons
  properties:
    submitText: submit
    cancelText: cancel
    submitType: primary
    cancelType: text
- brick: eo-submit-buttons
  properties:
    submitText: click to disabled
    cancelText: cancel
    submitType: text
    cancelType: text
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-submit-buttons
#   submit-text="submit"
#   cancel-text="cancel"
#   submit-type="primary"
#   cancel-type="text"
# ></eo-submit-buttons>
# <eo-submit-buttons
#   submit-text="click to disabled"
#   cancel-text="cancel"
#   submit-type="text"
#   cancel-type="text"
# ></eo-submit-buttons>
# 
```

### Event

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-submit-buttons
  properties:
    submitText: submit
    cancelText: cancel
  events:
    submit:
      - action: message.success
        args:
          - Submit
    cancel:
      - action: message.warn
        args:
          - Cancel
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-submit-buttons
#   submit-text="submit"
#   cancel-text="cancel"
#   id="brick-1"
# ></eo-submit-buttons>
# 
# <script>
#   const brick_1 = document.getElementById("brick-1");
#   brick_1.addEventListener("submit", (e) => {
#     const message = document.createElement("basic.show-notification");
#     message.resolve({ type: "success", message: "Submit" });
#   });
#   brick_1.addEventListener("cancel", (e) => {
#     const message = document.createElement("basic.show-notification");
#     message.resolve({ type: "warn", message: "Cancel" });
#   });
# </script>
# 
```

eo-checkbox.doc:
表单复选框构件。 ```yaml preview - brick: eo-checkbox properties: options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ## Examples ### Label ```yaml preview - brick: eo-checkbox properties: label: city options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ### Value ```yaml preview - brick: eo-checkbox properties: value: - Beijing - Guangzhou options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ### Options ```yaml preview - brick: eo-checkbox properties: options: - Beijing - Shanghai - Guangzhou - Shenzhen value: - Guangzhou - brick: eo-checkbox properties: options: - label: Beijing value: 0 - label: Shanghai value: 1 icon: icon: "bar-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 - label: Shenzhen value: 3 value: - 2 - 3 - brick: eo-checkbox properties: options: - true - false value: - true # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # # # ``` ### Disabled ```yaml preview - brick: eo-checkbox properties: options: - label: Beijing value: 0 disabled: true - label: Shanghai value: 1 - label: Guangzhou value: 2 - label: Shenzhen value: 3 - brick: div properties: style: height: 20px - brick: eo-checkbox properties: disabled: true options: - label: Beijing value: 0 - label: Shanghai value: 1 - label: Guangzhou value: 2 - label: Shenzhen value: 3 # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # #
# # # # ``` ### Type ```yaml preview - brick: eo-checkbox properties: label: Default type: default options: - label: Beijing value: 0 icon: icon: "search" lib: "antd" - label: Shanghai value: 1 icon: icon: "plus" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 icon: icon: "edit" lib: "antd" - label: Shenzhen value: 3 icon: icon: "delete" lib: "antd" - brick: div properties: style: height: 20px - brick: eo-checkbox properties: label: Icon type: icon options: - label: Beijing value: 0 icon: icon: "search" lib: "antd" - label: Shanghai value: 1 icon: icon: "plus" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 icon: icon: "edit" lib: "antd" - label: Shenzhen value: 3 icon: icon: "delete" lib: "antd" # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # #
# # # # ``` ### checkboxColor ```yaml preview - brick: eo-checkbox properties: options: - label: Beijing value: 0 checkboxColor: red - label: Shanghai value: 1 checkboxColor: orange icon: icon: "bar-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 checkboxColor: blue - label: Shenzhen value: 3 checkboxColor: green value: - 2 - 1 # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ### optionGroups ```yaml preview - brick: eo-checkbox events: change: action: console.log properties: isGroup: true label: 商品 name: goods optionGroups: - key: fruits name: 水果 options: - label: 苹果 value: apple - label: 香蕉 value: banana - key: vegetables name: 蔬菜 options: - label: 土豆 value: potato value: - banana - potato # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ### Event ```yaml preview - brick: eo-checkbox properties: id: option-checkbox options: - label: Beijing value: 0 - label: Shanghai value: 1 icon: icon: "bar-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 - label: Shenzhen value: 3 events: change: - action: message.success args: - <% JSON.stringify(EVENT.detail) %> options.change: - action: message.success args: - <% JSON.stringify(EVENT.detail) %> - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: Click to Change Radio Option events: click: - target: "#option-checkbox" properties: options: - label: Beijing value: 0 - label: Shanghai value: 1 icon: icon: "bar-chart" lib: "antd" - label: Guangzhou value: 2 - label: Shenzhen value: 3 - label: Hangzhou value: 4 # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # Click to Change Radio Option # # # ```

eo-dynamic-form-item.doc:
动态表单构件。

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-form
  properties:
    layout: vertical
    values:
      id: request_5XXX
      dimension:
        - dimensionName: one
          dimensionId: one
          dimensionValue: 1
  children:
    - brick: eo-input
      properties:
        name: id
        label: 指标ID
        required: true
    - brick: eo-dynamic-form-item
      properties:
        name: dimension
        label: 维度
        useBrick:
          - brick: eo-input
            properties:
              name: dimensionName
              required: true
              message:
                required: 维度名称为必填项
              label: 维度名称
          - brick: eo-input
            properties:
              name: dimensionId
              required: true
              message:
                required: 维度id为必填项
              label: 维度id
              unique: true
              validator: '<% (value) => (value.length > 5 ? "维度id不能超过5" : "") %>'
          - brick: eo-input
            properties:
              name: dimensionValue
              label: 维度值
    - brick: eo-submit-buttons
      properties:
        cancelText: 取消
        submitText: 提交
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-form layout="vertical" values="[object Object]">
#   <eo-input name="id" label="指标ID" required></eo-input>
#   <eo-dynamic-form-item
#     name="dimension"
#     label="维度"
#     id="brick-1"
#   ></eo-dynamic-form-item>
#   <eo-submit-buttons cancel-text="取消" submit-text="提交"></eo-submit-buttons>
# </eo-form>
# 
# <script>
#   const brick_1 = document.getElementById("brick-1");
#   brick_1.useBrick = [
#     {
#       brick: "eo-input",
#       properties: {
#         name: "dimensionName",
#         required: true,
#         message: {
#           required: "维度名称为必填项",
#         },
#         label: "维度名称",
#       },
#     },
#     {
#       brick: "eo-input",
#       properties: {
#         name: "dimensionId",
#         required: true,
#         message: {
#           required: "维度id为必填项",
#         },
#         label: "维度id",
#         unique: true,
#         validator:
#           '<% (value) => (value.length > 5 ? "维度id不能超过5" : "") %>',
#       },
#     },
#     {
#       brick: "eo-input",
#       properties: {
#         name: "dimensionValue",
#         label: "维度值",
#       },
#     },
#   ];
# </script>
# 
```

## Examples

### Label

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-dynamic-form-item
  properties:
    label: Label
    useBrick:
      - brick: eo-input
        properties:
          name: input
      - brick: eo-select
        properties:
          name: select
          options:
            - Beijing
            - Shanghai
            - Guangzhou
            - Shenzhen
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
```

### hideRemoveButton、disabledRemoveButton;hideAddButton、disabledAddButton

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-dynamic-form-item
  properties:
    hideAddButton: <% (value)=>value.length===5 %>
    disabledAddButton: <% (value)=>value.length===4 %>
    hideRemoveButton: <% (value,row)=>row===1 %>
    disabledRemoveButton: <% (value,row)=>row===0 %>
    value:
      - input: hello1
        select: abc1
      - input: hello2
        select: abc2
      - input: hello3
        select: abc3
    useBrick:
      - brick: eo-input
        properties:
          name: input
      - brick: eo-select
        properties:
          name: select
          options:
            - abc1
            - abc2
            - abc2
            - abc4
```

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-dynamic-form-item
  properties:

```

```yaml preview

  properties:
    checkedText: 123
    unCheckedText: 456
    disabled: false
    size: small
    label: text
    checkedIcon:
      icon: plus-circle
      lib: antd
      theme: outlined
    unCheckedIcon:
      icon: plus-circle
      lib: antd
```

```yaml preview
# 
```

eo-time-picker.doc:
构件 `eo-time-picker` ## Examples ### Basic ```yaml preview - brick: eo-time-picker properties: label: time placeholder: 选择时间 value: "12:30:01" # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # ``` ### 国际化 ```yaml preview - brick: eo-time-picker - brick: div properties: style: display: grid gap: 1em children: - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: 中文 events: click: useProvider: basic.change-language args: - zh callback: success: action: message.success args: - '<% I18N_TEXT({ zh: "你好", "en": "Hello" }) %>' - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: English events: click: useProvider: basic.change-language args: - en callback: success: action: message.success args: - '<% I18N_TEXT({ zh: "你好", "en": "Hello" }) %>' # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # #
# 中文 # English #
# # # ``` ### event ```yaml preview - brick: eo-time-picker events: change: action: console.log open: action: console.log close: action: console.log properties: label: time placeholder: 选择时间 # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ```

eo-date-picker.doc:
构件 `eo-date-picker` ## Examples ### Basic ```yaml preview - brick: eo-date-picker # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # ``` ### picker ```yaml preview - brick: eo-radio events: change: - target: "#datePicker" properties: picker: <% EVENT.detail.value %> properties: options: - label: 天 value: date - label: 周 value: week - label: 月 value: month - label: 季度 value: quarter - label: 年 value: year - brick: div properties: style: display: grid gap: 1em children: - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: 中文 events: click: useProvider: basic.change-language args: - zh callback: success: action: message.success args: - '<% I18N_TEXT({ zh: "你好", "en": "Hello" }) %>' - brick: eo-button properties: textContent: English events: click: useProvider: basic.change-language args: - en callback: success: action: message.success args: - '<% I18N_TEXT({ zh: "你好", "en": "Hello" }) %>' - brick: eo-date-picker properties: id: datePicker useFastSelectBtn: true # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # #
# 中文 # English #
# # # # ``` ### showTime ```yaml preview - brick: eo-date-picker events: ok: action: console.log change: action: console.log properties: showTime: true value: "2020-02-01 14:30:00" format: "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ``` ### 禁用日期 ```yaml preview - brick: eo-date-picker events: ok: action: console.log change: action: console.log properties: disabledDate: - weekday: 4 - date: 10-15 year: 2010-2020 - hour: 12-18 minute: 0-29 weekday: 3 format: "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" showTime: true value: "2019-10-01 00:00:00" # -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) -- # # # # ```

eo-time-range-picker.doc:
构件 `eo-time-range-picker`

## Examples

### Basic

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-time-range-picker
  properties:
    label: hello
    name: time
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-time-range-picker label="hello" name="time"></eo-time-range-picker>
# 
```

### rangeType

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-radio
  properties:
    options:
      - time
      - date
      - dateTime
      - hmTime
      - week
      - month
      - quarter
      - year
  events:
    change:
      - target: "#rangePicker"
        properties:
          rangeType: <% EVENT.detail.value %>
- brick: eo-time-range-picker
  properties:
    label: hello
    name: time
    id: rangePicker
    rangeType: date
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-radio id="brick-1"></eo-radio>
# <eo-time-range-picker
#   label="hello"
#   name="time"
#   id="rangePicker"
# ></eo-time-range-picker>
# 
# <script>
#   const brick_1 = document.getElementById("brick-1");
#   brick_1.options = [
#     "time",
#     "date",
#     "dateTime",
#     "hmTime",
#     "week",
#     "month",
#     "quarter",
#     "year",
#   ];
#   brick_1.addEventListener("change", (e) => {
#     const brick = document.querySelector("#rangePicker");
#     brick.rangeType = "<% EVENT.detail.value %>";
#   });
# 
#   const rangePicker = document.getElementById("rangePicker");
#   rangePicker.rangeType = "date";
# </script>
# 
```

### presetRanges

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-time-range-picker
  properties:
    label: hello
    name: time
    rangeType: week
    required: true
    presetRanges:
      - 本周
      - 本月
      - 本季度
      - 今年
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-time-range-picker
#   label="hello"
#   name="time"
#   required
#   id="brick-1"
# ></eo-time-range-picker>
# 
# <script>
#   const brick_1 = document.getElementById("brick-1");
#   brick_1.rangeType = "week";
#   brick_1.presetRanges = ["本周", "本月", "本季度", "今年"];
# </script>
# 
```

### validate

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-form
  events:
    values.change:
      - action: console.log
    validate.success:
      - action: message.success
        args:
          - 表单提交成功
    validate.error:
      - action: message.error
        args:
          - 表单校验失败
  slots:
    "":
      bricks:
        - brick: eo-time-range-picker
          events:
            change:
              action: console.log
          properties:
            label: hello
            name: time
            required: true
        - brick: eo-submit-buttons
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-form id="brick-1">
#   <eo-time-range-picker
#     label="hello"
#     name="time"
#     required
#     id="brick-2"
#   ></eo-time-range-picker>
#   <eo-submit-buttons></eo-submit-buttons>
# </eo-form>
# 
# <script>
#   const brick_1 = document.getElementById("brick-1");
#   brick_1.addEventListener("values.change", (e) => {
```
